short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay in the flow - see Gmail messages and Google Calendar events at-a-glance without switching tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key features:

- View unread messages. Mark them as read or move them to the trash to keep your inbox synced and tidy.
- See a timeline of upcoming calendar events, so you can stay on top of your schedule.
